lead_paragraph: APPLEMAN--Mark J. When trees lose their leaves that form a beautiful pattern on the earth, so are the memories of you imprinted in my heart. Love you forever, Marguerite 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  APPLEMAN, MARK J
